text: Mata arrā ga kono yō ni ōse rareta toki o omoe. `Maruyamu no ko īsā yo, anata wa “arrā no soto ni, watashi to watashi no haha to o 2 hashira no kami to seyo. ” To hitobito ni tsugeta ka.' Kare wa mōshiageta. `Anata ni tatae are. Watashi ni ken'nō no nai koto o, watashi wa iubekidearimasen. Mo shi watashi ga sore o ittanaraba, kanarazu anata wa shitte ora remasu. Anata wa, watashi no kokoronouchi o shitte ora remasu. Daga watashi wa anata no o kokoronouchi wa shirimasen. Hontōni anata wa subete no ōgi o jukuchi nasa rete imasu
